unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Just Got an Upgrade!**
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Just Got an Upgrade!

unnormalised: Hey folks! Getting those Insta reels seen is tough, right? But guess what? Follower analytics are getting a serious desi upgrade! Think detailed demographics, engagement patterns mapped to festive seasons like Diwali (super helpful!), and even sentiment analysis that understands Hinglish!
normalised: Hey folks! Getting those Insta reels seen is tough, right? But guess what? Follower analytics are getting a serious desi upgrade! Think detailed demographics, engagement patterns mapped to festive seasons like Diwali (super helpful!), and even sentiment analysis that understands Hinglish!

unnormalised: Major players like SocialGyan and FollowerDekho are rolling out updates that promise to give you a clearer picture of your audience. One feature predicts peak engagement times – no more posting at 3 AM when everyone's asleep! Imagine knowing exactly when to drop that meme about Rahul's cricket six to get maximum love.
normalised: Major players like SocialGyan and FollowerDekho are rolling out updates that promise to give you a clearer picture of your audience. One feature predicts peak engagement times – no more posting at three A M when everyone's asleep! Imagine knowing exactly when to drop that meme about Rahul's cricket six to get maximum love.

unnormalised: Plus, they're integrating data on regional preferences, so you can tailor your content for audiences in, say, Chennai vs. Delhi. Early beta users are reporting up to a 20% jump in engagement. The full rollout is expected around 15/11/2024, just in time for Christmas season marketing! Also, a live webinar is scheduled for 10:00 hrs on 26/10/2024 on this topic. The speakers are graduates from IIM Ahmedabad. They are really hot on this topic. Learn more at www.exampleanalytics.in on 01/01/2025.
